    • getPlayers

      public static Player[] getPlayers​(java.util.Scanner in)
      Gets all the players that will be participating in the game. Does this differently depending on the gamemode.
      Parameters:
      in - The main scanner
      Returns:
      Returns an array of players

      players - The list of players

      Parameters:

      players - The players participating
      wheel - The wheel to use for this round
